Cheltenham Street Pastors

Published on: 22 Sep 2023

Join The Street Pastors

The Street Pastors will be back out on the streets of Cheltenham. In order to continue the providing the service, we need more volunteers to join our team. If you, or any member of your church would be interested in joining the team, please complete the recruitment information on this link Join Street Pastors or follow the link on the Street Pastors website.

Bulma by Jeremy Thomas.
